'''Hardworking Silio''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared the [[Carmen Dei Chapter]], Act I: [[Should You Be Trapped in a Windless Land]] and the Version 1.1 event [[While It's Warm]].

==Profile==
In A Child's Secret, Silio is seen drinking with [[Kaeya]], [[Diluc]], and [[Reckless Pallad]]. He drinks to lift his own burdens away, and says that if he ever had an imaginary friend, it'd be a beer mug.<ref name="ACS">{{Ref/Quest|A Child's Secret}}</ref>

===Personality===
Not much is known about Silio's personality, but as his nickname suggests, he is most likely a hard worker. He will, however, not pass up the opportunity to drink beer to alleviate his problems.<ref name="ACS"/>

===Appearance===
Silio is a man of average height and build with medium-length chestnut hair. His hair is kept in a low, thin ponytail while his messy bangs are swept to the left side of his face, nearly covering his eye. His eyes are almond-shaped and teal, framed by a pair of bold eyebrows. His attire is of varying shades of brown, with a dark chocolate tee and knee-length pants, and a hazel vest with an assortment of strings.
